title: Nuuk Stadium
text:
Nuuk Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose venue</a> in <a href="Nuuk">Nuuk</a>, <a href="Greenland">Greenland</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches. It has a capacity for 2,000.
FIFA 2-star artificial turf was installed on the pitch in July 2016. The 2-star rating is the highest achievable rating for an artificial surface and is suitable for all <a href="UEFA">UEFA</a> competitions.
Venue.
It can also be used as an entertainment venue. On November 2, 2007, <a href="Scottish%20people">Scottish</a> rock band <a href="Nazareth%20%28band%29">Nazareth</a>, of "<a href="Love%20Hurts">Love Hurts</a>" fame, performed at the venue, and on April 1, 2011, the venue was visited by <a href="Suzi%20Quatro">Suzi Quatro</a>.
